sentences.sContent: I’m going to show you how to make a box for your tools.
sentences.sCn: 我来教你怎么做一个箱子存放工具。

sentences.sContent: A family of mice had made their nest in the roof.
sentences.sCn: 一窝老鼠在屋顶上安了家。

sentences.sContent: She made her own wedding dress.
The company has been making quality furniture for over 200 years.
sentences.sCn: 这家公司制作优质家具有两百多年的历史了。

sentences.sContent: They met while they were making a film.
sentences.sCn: 他们是在拍电影时认识的。

sentences.sContent: Make a list of all the things you need.
sentences.sCn: 把你需要的所有物品列一份清单。

synos.tran: 使得；进行；布置，准备，整理；制造；认为；获得；形成；安排；引起；构成

phrases.pCn: 理解；辨认出；说明；填写；设法应付
求活；创造人生；有意义的活

words.tran: 制造者；造物主；出期票人
做，使，安排（make的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 制造， 做； 使成为
trans.tranOther: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together
